node.title: When Is the UEFA Champions League Round of 16 Draw?
node.alt: Chelsea are the current holders of the UEFA Champions League trophy and are through to the last 16 of the 2021/22 competition.
node.description: Chelsea, Liverpool, Real Madrid, Bayern Munich and the rest of the teams still in the UEFA Champions League will find out who their next opponent is today.
node.content:
["Sixteen teams are waiting to find out who they'll play as the draw for the knockout rounds of the UEFA Champions League takes place today.", "The group stages are over and 16 European soccer clubs have made it through to the next stage, but some giants like Barcelona, AC Milan and Borussia Dortmund failed to make it through.", "While the draw for the round of 16 is made today, the games will be held across February and March 2022. The group winners are in one pot and will be drawn against one of the group runners-up in the last 16, before the competition moves on to the quarter-finals.", "The draw for the 2021/22 Europa League knockout stages will also be held on the same day but an hour later. The draw for the inaugural UEFA Europa Conference League knockout phase will also be held.", "
When is the Champions League round of 16 draw held?
", "The ceremony for the last 16 of the 2021/22 UEFA Champions League will be held in Europe, meaning it will be very early for American audiences.", "On Monday, December 13 the draw will begin from 6:00 a.m. ET and 3:00 a.m. PT.", "The ceremony usually involves a brief presentation and discussions on soccer before former Champions League players pick the balls out of the pots.", "You can watch the ceremony live on UEFA.com or on the UEFA YouTube Channel for free.", "The Europa League knockout round play-off draw will be held just afterwards, with coverage beginning from 7:00 a.m. ET and 4:00 a.m. PT.", "
Which clubs are in the last 16 draw?
", "All four English clubs are still in the competition while three Spanish teams are left after Barcelona's exit. Two French teams, two Italian teams, two Portuguese teams and just one German team made it through the group stages. The Netherlands and Austria also have representation in the form of Ajax and Red Bull Salzburg, respectively.", "The group stage winners and therefore the seeded teams the draw are:", "The second-place teams, and unseeded teams are:", "Teams from the same country cannot play each other at the last 16 stage, while teams who also qualified from the same group will be kept apart too.", "There are 24 teams left in the Europa League, and the next draw will be a knockout play-off round, pitching the teams who came second in their groups against those who finished third in the Champions League group stages. The group winners from the Europa League group stages go straight through to the round of 16.", "", "
Chelsea are the current holders of the UEFA Champions League trophy and are through to the last 16 of the 2021/22 competition.
", "
When are the next stages of the UEFA Champions League held?
", "The games for the round of 16 in the 2021/22 Champions League will be played in February and March 2022.", "The first legs will be played on February 15, 16, 22 and 23 while the second legs will be played on March 8, 9, 15 and 16.", "After this, the draws for the quarter finals will be held on March 18, 2022 with the games being played on April 5, 6 and the 12,13.", "The draws for the semi-final will be held on March 18 at the same time as the quarter finals draw. The games will be held on April 26 and 27, with the second legs held on May 3 and 4.", "The Champions League final will be played in the Krestovsky Stadium in Saint Petersburg, Russia on May 28, 2022."]
